item.title: PostgreSQL Library v0.1.1.10
item.description:
Product: PostgreSQL Library v0.1.1.10
Company: JDP Science
Release Date: Fri, 29 May 2020 13:08:10 -0400
Packager: James Powell

Description: Wrapping of libPQ for PostgreSQL access. Higher-level than libPQ itself. See Examples.

Release Notes: Allow clusters of parameters to include subcluster structure (which is flattened away before binding) as a conveniance.
Add user and password fields to connection string of examples
item.dc:creator: JDP Science

item.title: XY Utilities v1.1.0.9
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.1.0.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 14 May 2020 16:23:16 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize, Shift Zero
- <b>Waveform Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform

Release Notes: New methods:
- Decimate Array: decimates an array of XY-Data, leaving the X&Y arrays intact
- Interpolate Parameter.vi: interpolate along "parameter" dimension
- Interpolate Y.vi: for a given x value interpolate and return a fractional Y value
- Shift Zero.vi: adjust zero value for a given fractional x index (useful for magnetic field sweeps)
Bug Fixes:
- Interpolate.vi: now also interpolates the x array
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
